name: awesome-agent-templates
description: Framework-agnostic standard and public template library for AI Agents

scripts.copy-templates: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const copyDir = (src, dest) => { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); fs.readdirSync(src, {withFileTypes: true}).forEach(entry => { const srcPath = path.join(src, entry.name); const destPath = path.join(dest, entry.name); if (entry.isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else if (entry.name.endsWith('.yaml')) { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } }); }; copyDir('templates', 'public/templates');"

author: awesome-agent-templates
